name: Reactor Burn
description:
You must deposit the crystals to power up the reactor. There's only one problem - the path leads over the heat vents... plasma combusts at over 100 million degrees, so don't get burned! Make sure you keep the reactor fed, or it'll start to lose its juice. Once it's powered up, get outta there.

Created in under 72 hours for the 100th Mini Jam



= Music =
Ludum Dare 38 - Track 4 by Abstraction
(abstractionmusic.bandcamp.com)
